bondstreet.heading: Bond Street is more than a lender
bondstreet.subHeading:
We’re a financial advocate to help you take the next big step for your business.
Whether you’re looking to hire a team, open a new space, purchase inventory, or refinance, Bond Street can provide you with growth capital.
bondstreet.cta: Complete a 10 minute online application and receive a loan decision within 48 hours.

intro.subHeading: This summer, Bond Street is launching “For New York,” a zine saluting the independent businesses who make NYC the best city in the world.
intro.logoHeading: Bond Street supports some of NYC's finest
intro.text: “For New York” represents the humble, eternal spirit of the New York City merchant. The small business. Our bars, our laundries, our hot dog sellers and our delicatessens, our bodegas, our dollar stores, our hardware stores, hell, our haberdasheries. These businesses have served New York City with dignity and distinction since this city was built—some are quiet, others make noise; some last a week, or a month, while others have lasted over a century, and are still kicking.

eventList.heading: Events
eventList.text: This summer, we’re celebrating the businesses that make NYC the best city in the world. Join us for an event series featuring independent businesses in NYC.
